alert.note: Alert for Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:59PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Sedgwick County through 530 PM CDT... At 459 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm near Goddard. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Goddard, Maize, West Wichita, Eisenhower National Airport and Lake Afton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
